data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Călărași prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Călărași, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Călărași a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary: On average, 26 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Călărași, Romania.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Călărași, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Călărași.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Călărași.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 262,370 lost in Călărași that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Călărași that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
